targets.query:
from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -1d, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_BW1_Automatik")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -1mo, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WW_BW1_Automatik")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> last()

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_Absenkungsart")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "config")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -12mo, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_Sommer_ab")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "config")

  |> range(start: -12y, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Frost_ab")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "config")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Brenner_Laufzeit_Summe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> spread()

from(bucket: "energie")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "heizung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "verbrauch")
  |> spread()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_BW2_Tag")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")

import "influxdata/influxdb/monitor"

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -12mo, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_BW2_Tag")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _level: if r._value==0 then "Nacht" else "Tag"}))
 
  |> monitor.stateChanges(
      fromLevel: "Tag",
      toLevel: "Nacht",
  )

  |> last()

import "influxdata/influxdb/monitor"

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -12mo, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_BW2_Tag")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _level: if r._value==0 then "Nacht" else "Tag"}))
 
  |> monitor.stateChanges(
      fromLevel: "Nacht",
      toLevel: "Tag",
  )

  |> last()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_BW2_Sommer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")

import "influxdata/influxdb/monitor"

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -12mo, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_BW2_Sommer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _level: if r._value==0 then "Winter" else "Sommer"}))
 
  |> monitor.stateChanges(
      fromLevel: "Sommer",
      toLevel: "Winter",
  )

  |> last()

import "influxdata/influxdb/monitor"

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -12mo, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_BW2_Sommer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _level: if r._value==0 then "Winter" else "Sommer"}))
 
  |> monitor.stateChanges(
      fromLevel: "Winter",
      toLevel: "Sommer",
  )

  |> last()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_Vorlaufsolltemperatur" or r["_measurement"] == "HK1_Vorlaufisttemperatur" or r["_measurement"] == "Brenner_Ansteuerung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 2m, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Brenner_Ansteuerung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -1y, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_Vorlaufsolltemperatur")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -1d, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_Vorlaufisttemperatur")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_Pumpe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -1y, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "HK1_Pumpe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WW_Solltemperatur" or r["_measurement"] == "WW_Isttemperatur" or r["_measurement"] == "HK1_BW1_Warmwasservorrang")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -1d, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WW_Solltemperatur")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -1d, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WW_Isttemperatur")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -21d, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Brenner_Laufzeit_Summe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> spread()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_stop", "sensor", "_field", "ort", "type"])
  |> group()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -12mo, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Brenner_Laufzeit_Summe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> window(every: 1mo)
  |> spread()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_stop", "sensor", "_field", "ort", "type"])
  |> group()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: 2022-10-25T00:00:00Z, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Oelzaehler")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_stop", "sensor", "_field", "ort", "type"])
  |> group()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -21d, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Oelzaehler")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> spread()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_stop", "sensor", "_field", "ort", "type"])
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    _liter: float(v: r._value/100.0),
  }))

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -12mo, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Oelzaehler")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> window(every: 1mo)
  |> spread()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_stop", "sensor", "_field", "ort", "type"])
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    _liter: float(v: r._value/100.0),
  }))

from(bucket: "energie")
  |> range(start: -21d, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "heizung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "verbrauch")
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> spread()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_stop", "sensor", "_field", "ort", "type"])
  |> group()

from(bucket: "energie")
  |> range(start: -12mo, stop: now())

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "verbrauch")
  |> window(every: 1mo)
  |> spread()
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "_stop", "sensor", "_field", "ort", "type"])
  |> group()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Aussentemperatur" or r["_measurement"] == "Aussentemperatur_gedaempft")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10m, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -1d, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Aussentemperatur")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Aussentemperatur")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Aussentemperatur")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> min()

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "status")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: -12mo, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "config")

from(bucket: "heizung")
